entry.title: Lavender & Rooibos Tea | Lavender in Lavender Hill (20 bags)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Health Teas
Price: 56.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender & Rooibos Tea (20 bags) are vegan-friendly and free of caffeine or other additives!

  • A delicious blend of lavender flowers and leaves, with traditional South African Rooibos
  • A warm cup of this Lavender & Rooibos Tea will help you wind down, de-stress and relax
  • Perfect before bedtime!
  • Full of antioxidants, as well as anti-inflammatory and soothing properties
  • Calms digestive discomfort, relieves constipation & indigestion
  • No artificial flavours or colourants, caffeine, preservatives or cruelty!
  • Teabags are packed in a foil pack which can be recycled
  • Vegan-friendly
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients 

Dried Lavender Flowers & Leaves, Rooibos Leaves

How to use

Steep a bag for 2-5 minutes before adding organic honey or milk.

entry.title: Lavender Scented Candle | Lavender in Lavender Hill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Home Products
Price: 91.50

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Scented Candles (sold individually) are made with pure essential lavender oil and lavender flowers - keep your home smelling fresh!

  • Light a candle to harness its aromatherapy benefits and create a peaceful, relaxing ambiance in your home
  • Helps you and your guests by relieving anxiety and restlessness
  • Also looks great as home decor! 
  • Help keep moths and mosquitoes away
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Candle wax, lavender essential oil, lavender flowers

entry.title: Lavender Pillow and Drawer Sachet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Home Products
Price: 31.50

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Pillow and Drawer Sachet is a handmade sachet, filled with fragrant lavender flowers, leaves and pure essential lavender oil!

  • Put next to or under your pillow for a peaceful, deep sleep
  • You can also use this Lavender Sachet to freshen up your car, drawers, cupboards, bathroom or handbag
  • Lavender has strong relaxing and calming properties
  • Lavender essential oil repels mosquitoes and moths
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Lavender flowers, leaves and pure essential lavender oil

Directions for use

Place under or next to your pillow at night. Place in your drawers, cupboards, bathroom, car and handbags for a fresh aroma!

entry.title: Lavender Magnesium Bath Salts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Bath
Price: 51.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Magnesium Bath Salts (250 ml) helps to quieten the mind and relieve any stress or anxiety when added to a hot bath at the end of a long day!

  • Add these soothing and calming lavender bath salts to a steaming bath
  • Soothes sore or tense muscles
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Coarse salt, magnesium sulphate, bicarbonate of soda, Lavandula Officinalis (lavender) essential oil, lavender flowers

Directions for use

Add a handful of bath salt to a warm bath. Immerse your body in the bath and feel the stress wash away!

entry.title: Lavender Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 35.50

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Lip Balm (10ml) is made from natural ingredients. It's smells lovely and moisturises, soothes and heals cracked, dry, sun burnt and sore lips!

  • Natural and organic ingredients
  • Highly nourishing with strong antioxidant and protective properties
  • Prevents cell damage and ageing
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Sweet almond oil, Beeswax, Avocado Butter, Lavender Essential Oil

Directions for use

Apply to your lips as often as needed.

entry.title: Lavender Hand Cream | Lavender in Lavender Hill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Skin Care
Price: 57.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Hand Cream (50ml) is the perfect size to carry in your handbag, and perfect to combat dryness caused by harsh hand sanitizers.

  • Soothes the skin, moisturises the skin, hydrates the skin
  • A great natural antiseptic and anti-inflammatory 
  • Made with real lavender
  • Improves elasticity, repairs skin damage, reduces signs of ageing and soothes dry, irritated skin
  • Helps eczema, rashes, insect bites, sunburn and skin irritations
  • No artificial colours, or fragrances
  • Palm oil-free, cruelty-free, vegan
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

How to use

 

Massage into your hands until fully absorbed.

Ingredients

Aqua, Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Water, Glycerin, Caprylic Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lavandula Officinalis (Lavender) Essential Oil.

*Certified Organic at Source.

entry.title: Lavender Eye Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 42.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Eye Mask is a handmade, natural and relaxing lavender eye mask to help guide you into a deep sleep with sweet dreams!

  • A wonderfully-scented lavender eye mask filled with fresh lavender leaves, which help promote relaxation and peace
  • Relieves headaches, tension and stress
  • Lavender repels mosquitoes and moths
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Fresh lavender

Directions for use

Lie back and apply over your eyes for a peaceful night's rest

entry.title: Lavender Essential Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Essential Oils
Price: 50.50

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender Essential Oil (10ml) is the perfect pure essential oil to rub on your temples, use in a burner, in your bath or in an aromatherapy carrier oil for massage!

  • Promotes deep sleep and alleviates stress and tension
  • Heals bites, burns, abrasions, rashes, sunburn, eczema and infections
  • Repels mosquitoes and moths
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Pure lavender essential oil

Directions for use

Add a few drops to a warm bath. Burn in a burner, or use in a diffuser. Add to carrier oil for an aromatherapy massage experience. Rub on to temples and wrists.

entry.title: Luxurious Handmade Lavender Soap | Lavender in Lavender Hill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Skin Care
Price: 44.50

Lavender in Lavender Hills' Handmade Lavender Soap (100g), a gentle and cleansing soap for the sink, shower or bath.

  • Handmade with coconut oil and essential lavender oil
  • Has a rich and creamy texture
  • The calming scent helps to ease stress
  • Lavender oil in soap has strong antibacterial and antiseptic properties
  • Assists in the healing of burns, insect bites, stings, infections, sunburn, skin irritation, skin disorders (e.g. after shave, rashes, eczema)
  • Leaves your skin moisturised, conditioned and hydrated
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Coconut and essential lavender oil (alkalizing agent used is Lye / sodium hydroxide and water - none of the chemical is left in the cured soap).

entry.title: Face Mask Red Shweshe (local community upliftment project)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Face Mask
Price: 44.00

3 layered COVID-19 medical face mask

  • A portion of the profit goes to COVID-19 relief in underprivileged areas
  • Sizes: Adult, small women/teen, 7-12 years, 3-6 years
  • 3 layers as recommended by our health department
  • The outer layer is beautiful 100% cotton Shweshwe, the middle layer is made from spunbond (used in medical masks) and the inner layer is polycotton
  • Proudly South Africa, beautiful, cotton AND effective
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place

Lavender in Lavender Hill is a community-based business with a strong social conscious focused on entrepreneur development and job creation in underprivileged communities throughout Cape Town. They produce all natural handmade lavender home, body and food products of high quality with healing benefits! All ingredients used are organic, free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances and harmful chemicals. Promoting the earth, community-upliftment and luxurious products!

entry.title: Lavender Massage and Body Oil (100ml) | Lavender in Lavender Hill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 91.50

Gentle natural lavender massage oil (100ml)

  • Soothing, nourishing and moisturising lavender essential oil, infused with rosemary extract, in a sweet almond oil base
  • Use for massaging or as a daily body oil
  • Relieves your skin from dryness, irritations, ageing and stretch marks
  • Free from petrochemicals, parabens, synthetic fragrances, harmful chemicals and mineral oil, and is NOT tested on animals
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients

Sweet Almond Oil (prunus amygdalis), Safflower Oil (carthamus tintorius), Jojoba Seed Oil (simmondsia chinensis), Rosemary extract, Vitamin E (tocopherol), Lavender (Lavendula Augustifolia) Essential Oil

Directions for use

Apply a thin layer after bath or before bed to the entire body or areas that need some special care!
